name: SadTrombone
0:
”Alexa, Sad Trombone”
”Alexa, ask Sad Trombone to play a sad trombone”
”Alexa, ask Sad Trombone to make a sad trombone sound”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sad trombone
des: Someone in the house tell a bad joke? Want to annoy your partner? Hit them with a perfectly timed sad trombone sound effect! You know the one, Wah Wah Wah Wah~~ Just like in the cartoons and movies! Sad Trombone is a one trick pony. To use the Alexa Skill just say "Alexa, Sad Trombone" and your perfectly timed trombone will play though the speakers. Perfect for every occasion.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
